title: New tech is redefining CMO title to include Metaverse - Mint
content: New tech is redefining CMO title to include Metaverse  Mint
description: The role of chief metaverse officer (CMO) is quickly gaining ground among corporates across the world. These individuals lead corporate strategies for building a future metaverse, a continuous virtual economy driven by VR and AR and allows commerce through blockchain-based digital currencies.
